original_text: When it was time for Elizabeth to have her baby, she gave birth to a son.
korean_text: 엘리사벳이 해산할 기한이 차서 아들을 낳으니

sentences.original_text: When it was time for Elizabeth to have her baby
sentences.korean_translation: 엘리사벳이 아기를 낳을 때가 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: she gave birth to a son
